attributes.action: Purchase 6 Burke-class ships rather than 6 Type 45 vessels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The MOD has originally planned to buy 12 next-gen DDGs (which goal I'd like to be achieved).
6 have been ordered as of today, and they are all Type 45 vessels. Each of them is Ł400 mn more expensive than a Burke-class DDG, and yet technically inferior. The Australians have rightly chosen American-designed Burke-class DDGs, and yet they have also been granted the licence to build them at Australian shipyards, meaning that British shipbuilders could too.
Please order Burke-class DDGs, not Type 45 vessels.
